title: New: Silent Devices – Marchlands
body:
[![13587_10151427678963169_441752620_n](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/13587_10151427678963169_441752620_n-260x105.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/19388-new-silent-devices-marchlands/attachment/13587_10151427678963169_441752620_n/)After a period of relative silence following the release of their double-A single _Una/Moire_ last year, Leicester-based ambient rockers **Silent Devices** return with ‘Marchlands’. Another individual release, it’s a track which seamlessly weaves together singer Josh Coyne’s beautifully understated vocals with the instantly recognisable guitar twang that so often stands out – but never dominates – on their songs.

The release of ‘Marchlands’ fits in with the band’s tendency to produce truly gorgeous music at a tragically sparse rate. There’s potential for a truly great album here somewhere – it’s just a matter of time.

Another individual release, it’s a track which seamlessly weaves together singer Josh Coyne’s beautifully understated vocals with the instantly recognisable guitar twang that so often stands out – but never dominates – \[…\]
